question: Which state has launched a statewide football grassroots development programme 'Mission Football'?
explanation: Meghalaya Chief Minister Mukul Sangma officially launched a statewide football grassroots development programme 'Mission Football'. Mission Football is a pet project of the chief minister for developing a sustainable infrastructure for the sport in all the 11 districts of the state which has in the past produced national team players like Rocus Lamare, Aiborlang Khongjee and Eugeneson Lyngdoh. The plan is to develop approximately 1,400 playgrounds in all the 11 districts.
